name: The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron Boy Genius: Attack of the Twonkies
name_original: The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron Boy Genius: Attack of the Twonkies
description: The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius: Attack of the Twonkies is a 2004 video game published by THQ. The game is based on the American animated series The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius, in turn based on the 2001 film, Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius. The game was developed by THQ Studio Australia for the GameCube and PlayStation 2. A Game Boy Advance version was developed by Tantalus.
